alert.note: Alert for Clay (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 06 at 5:06PM CST until March 06 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Clay County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 506 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm producing a tornado was located over Datto, or near Corning, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Corning, Success, Datto, Twin Oaks, Heelstring and Palatka. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
